caption: Great selection. The backyard is a nice little escape.
Some great quality beers
Great beer selection! Go there!
Great selection of top US and International craft beers
Great backyard patio. Great beer selection.
Overpriced
Decided to stop while walking down this street randomly. Nice spot to chill out.
Great place! Amazing Bartenders!

Lucky to have this place around the corner. Awesome staff and you can’t beat these beers. Can’t wait to have a drink on the back patio here again, but takeout cans and crowlers have saved our sanity these past few months!
(Translated by Google) Very good, but we could have taken the "nightcap"  (Original) Muito boa, mas poderíamos ter tomado a "saideira"
Great beers, great service
Great rotating beer selection, and Mike is the man. Awesome bar.
Delightful cocktails & brew specials.
Delicious beers and nice staff!
Professional 👍👏🏻👏🏻👏🏻

Small neighborhood bar with a focus on craft beer and whiskey. Fifteen rotating beers on tap. A large selection of cans and bottles to stay or to go. They also frequently feature cider, hard kombucha and mead. Super friendly staff. Tiny backyard for warm days.
New spot for my day drinking. Bob the bartender was extremely helpful. I'll be back.
Crowlers are great deals for take away

Please change the lighting. All you have to do is cover/darken the lamps over the bar. Please. The light is harsh and it makes me not want to ever come back here again.  Gel the beer cooler lights with red or blue. Change the glass covers over the Edison bulbs. You could also change the white bulb in the drop ceiling ‘hats’ In front of the exit sign by the front door. Thanks 👍
This is a great, chill neighborhood bar. We’ve come here several times. They have a very large selection of draft beers. They even have a selection of vintage beers.

I really like this spot. Always have the latest can releases. Great tap selection, bartenders have a good knowledge of beer. They also have spirits, which is great if you're in a group of non beer drinkers. They also have Crowlers, which is great if you want to take beer to go.
Awesome beer selection & good service

A cozy spot with a backyard that's a ten minute ride from my apt . Draft list slays. And the bourbon and whiskey prices aren't bad either . They will also fill crowlers for certain beers on draft, which is good for a share setting. Truly a gem.
Had a very good experience in here with my wife. The food comes out quickly and the service is just good. Prices are reasonable.
Great selection of beer and friendly staff.
Austin is super friendly and helpful. He also offers very fast service and uses his downtime to beautify the bar.
Have so many beer options, loved the feel of it. Would definitely go again
Good trendy beers and a little terasse in the back,

Great selection and interesting wall art contribution to awesome beers. Friendly staff! Their draft selection is unreal. Who gets hill farmstead on tap? These guys do. Seriously, a hidden gem in Brooklyn that somehow has some of the best beers across the country on tap. Kudos to their thoughtful tap list.
Love Hops Hill, great extensive list of beers both standard and rotating, in draft and in cans and bottles.
Small space inside and even smaller space outside. They've got a wide range of craft beers and a solid bar. Bartender knew what he was doing, nice pours and a laid back, knowledgeable personality.
I stop in for the draft and a shot special...they use good whiskey, nuff said.
The best!  Joe and the gang are very knowledgeable about beer.
Great tap list and chill vibe.
Very Hoppy 👍👍
Great beer selection on tap

Great vibes. Great beers. Great backyard. Very much a community feel. Seems like there are a lot of regulars. Good spot on the weekend for couples who are in between brunch and a movie. Decor is ok, don't go here expecting anything lavish. It's exactly what it's meant to be - a place to lay back and drink good beer. You're able to take away cans and crowlers (larger cans) here.
Great beer selection, kinda small but it's really good!

Great place for the latest in good northeast beers, from hot names like Hill Farmstead and Suarez to the latest collaboration brews from around the country. Pricing is extremely fair, the crowd is always a good one and do yourself a favor, close this review and go have a damn beer.
Huge Beer selection. Warm friendly atmosphere.
Good draft selection
Great beer selection, chill vibe. None of the snobbery. Best well tequila I've ever had.
Perfect, it's small but the mood is just right, the server was amazing and friendly
hippity hoppity
Nice clean atmosphere
Had a great time! Would recommend to all my friends.
Great selection of beers and spirits! The space is small and the staff are friendly and are always down to give a recommendation.
Beer was greattt
Craft beer, good sandwiches. A little too bright.
Always an awesome beer selection and chill vibe.

Undoubtedly one of the best beer bars in the NYC area. Great selection, great staff that is very knowledgeable about the beers on tap and very reasonable prices for what they have. The food is also great if you try one of their paninis. This place is low-key without being snooty, highly recommended for great beer.
Great beer menu and a knowledgeable bartender.
Fire selection of beer and whiskey
Delicious beer, cozy and nice place to just be :)

Cosy bar with friendly staff offering a range of craft beers (12 taps with rotating beers). Hops Hill also offer an impressive range of whiskey as well as serving cocktails, but the clue to why you'd primarily go here is obvious :) The beers here were really good & bar made sandwiches really tasty. Definitely a place to go back to.
(Translated by Google) Very small  (Original) Muy pequeño
The best beer list. I mean, it's really strong! And crowlers (can growlers) !!
Top notch beer bar for beer fanatistics who want to drink and buy rare stuff
The selection is simply insane. Felt like going to some kind of beer museum! Would definitely stop in again.
Dont sleep on the sandwiches here.  Enjoy the back patio.

one of the best places for craft beer in all of the 5 boroughs!!!! Nobody has a better selection of Suarez, Hill farmstead, Prairie, Oxbow. not to mention their whiskey selection is out of this world.....If you genuinely enjoy craft beer in a great neighborhood with great food options, Hops hill is the place to go!!

Having lived in the neighborhood for the past 4 years, I feel inclined to give my two cents. First of all, let's start with the positives. The bar itself is clean and cozy with a friendly staff. It also offers a large selection of quality craft beers, on par with offerings you'd find at the many craft spots around NYC. However, the prices here are easily the most expensive in the area (Clinton Hill, Fort Greene, etc.) I don't really mind paying more for a superior product, but I can't help but notice when the same beers you might find at Tørst are actually more expensive at Hops Hill. And the prices are noticeably higher than at quality nearby beer spots such as Covenhoven, Glorietta Baldy, and Fulton Grand. The prices remind me of Fools Gold in the LES, which offers similarly high prices and an unparalleled ambience IN MANHATTAN. Also, at least to me, the ambience of the bar hasn't really gelled yet and it still has a bit of a manicured, sterile feel. Don't get me wrong. I'm glad to see parts of Fulton Street get a makeover, but at what cost?
The beer selection is unique and worth checking out for a special night out. If you aren't into craft beer, it is not for you.
Great selection, pricy for out-of-towners, but seems competitive for NYC. Bartender was prompt and knowledgeable. Can watch sports here. Not a ton of seating, but not an issue when I visited
Nice quiet neighborhood place to grab a beer - choose from an excellent selection of craft beers and ciders.

A great beer bar with a good selection of craft beer and spirits usually a few ciders on tap as well. There are also a few dozen bottles and cans available to drink on site or take away. Many of the beers on tap are also available for take away as crowlers. Bartenders are knowledgeable, friendly and down to earth. There have been issues with their fridge which meant they couldn't make sandwiches but they seem to have resolved this.
If you want craft beer and light snacks to go with it you're at the right spot, never fails...they also have a small cozy outside area in the back
Nice bar with a good wide variety of beers
The best place for great selection, knowledge and community in the craft beer world.  Joe and his team offer the best of the brews and knowledge.  Sharing is highly recommended.
Very inviting and a great selection of beer. The wifi is fast so I can stare at my phone and be super anti social as I get drunk by myself. I'm so lonely....
Great beer selection and outdoor patio.
One of the best draft lists in the neighborhood. Knowledgeable staff. "Crowlers" to go. Small outdoor area in back.
Nice bar with an excellent craft beer selection. Nice back patio too.
Great bar.  Bartender was friendly and they had an excellent selection on Tap.  Good local selection to go as well.
Solid offering of beers on tap and in can/bottle.  Knowledgeable staff, good service.
Solid draft and decent bottle selections. Bar space is simple and cozy, and the outdoor space is pretty nice and sports four tables. Worth a visit!

(Translated by Google) THE PLACE to end the day with friends trying some amazing beers. Good atmosphere, excellent service and very good snacks to accompany those beers.  (Original) EL LUGAR para terminar el día con amistades probando unas cervezas increíbles. Buen ambiente, excelente atención y muy buenos bocadillos para acompañar esas cervezas.
Great selection of local craft beer.
Great bartender, excellent taps, solid food
Great craft beer bar in Clinton Hill.  Glad to have them in the neighborhood.
Lovely outdoor patio
Great beer selection. A clean, well-lit place
Tasty beer
One of a kind beer spot. No pretense, no bullshit. Just good stuff on tap from knowledgable bartenders.
Huge bottle and draft selection, a great place for beer snobs. They also fill these mini keg things that they call "crowlers". Kind of like a growler can.
Nice beer selection but the bar tender lacked a lots of energy and motivation.
Cool little beer spot with a great selection that can be freshly canned for take-out.

Rustic feeling bar that serves a great selection of craft beers at affordable prices.  It's located across the street from Emily (a popular and delicious restaurant). If you're looking for a fun date night, grab a drink or two here before getting a bite there, it's a great combo!

Awesome bar in Clinton Hill down the street from Pizza Loves Emily, great spot to wait for a table.  They had a really good selection of craft beer, one of the best in the city. They have Crowler Machine too, can put your beer in a can and seal it up to take home. Really cool spot - will come back.
Great spot!
Cool spot with a large selection of beer!
Excellent beer selection! Knowledgeable staff.

Nice neighborhood craft beer bar --- I visited on a Friday night.  The bar wasn't packed.  The draft lines offer great selections of beers and ciders.  The place is not that big --- a bar and a few tables near the front.  The bartenders are nice and friendly.  Never tried the sandwich, but they do offer sandwiches and chips.  Would definitely come again on my next visit to Prospect Heights.
Clean. Great selection. Knowledgable staff who knows their beers! Good experience.

Wandered in after stumbling on it when visiting the Kelso brewery round the corner. Great selection of beers on tap and in the fridge. They even stocked bottles from a small brewery from the north west of Ireland. Had the sandwiches as well, nice short list, freshly made and very nice. Will pop back when in NYC again.

A rather tiny craft beer bar that specializes in bringing great beer to the thirsty Brooklyn market. I can only imagine how quickly it can get packed; if you're familiar with Proletariat, it's just a hair bigger. The bottle list and draft list are consistently one of the best in New York City, and there are plenty of events that bring great tap takeovers their way. Hops Hill is a must stop for any craft beer fan that's visiting the city!
Nice bar, chill, great stuff on draft, and there are some real gems in the fridge if you are willing to dish out for them.
Great selection but way over priced. All of the bottles have almost a 50% mark up. Plenty of other places around with a similar selection and priced more reasonably.
Fantastic selection of beer in a comfortable and spacious setting. Not amazing on the ambiance but nice.
Great craft beers on tap, friendly bartenders
Phenomenal bar. Great beer selection. Check out the fridge for hard to find bottles.
Perhaps my new favorite beer bar, Hops Hill has great bartenders, an impressive selection of brews, and a relaxed casual atmosphere with upscale fixtures; the marble bar is super classy.
Simply great beer and laid back atmosphere. Music does the trick. Really can't beat the fresh kegs and regular rotation of craft beers!
Quiet spot with great taps.
Best beer, cleanest lines. Impressive bourbon selection and friendly, knowledgeable staff. There's a reason it's rated best beer bar in NYC- sandwiches are great too!

Feel thirsty? This is the place to come to cool down after hectic work day or week and enjoy the evening with variety of beers.  Revolving beer selection and knowledgeable staff will find the match to your palate and mood.

Hops Hill is pretty new, but is already a prototype on the right way to run a beer bar.  Their tap list is full of interesting stuff, including a lot of options from local breweries (Other Half, Finback, etc.).  Didn't find what you like there?  They have a lot of interesting bottles as well, including some rarer stuff (BCS, Crooked Stave).  They're also the only bar in NY that I've seen offering Westvleteren for sale which is above and beyond.  The bartenders are knowledgeable and friendly.  The lighting is on the darker side but not too dark that you can't read the menu.  The place has a roof and some chairs.  That's really all a good beer bar needs, and yet plenty of places manage to screw it up.  It also happens to be a great place to wait if you're trying to grab a table at Emily down the block.  I wish the owners luck although it definitely seems like they don't need it, and I hope to come back up here soon.
Great beer list on tap and bottles of new and rare beer. One of the top beer bars in the city with a low key vibe, room to sit and best prices anywhere.

Among the best beer bars in Clinton Hill. The evening I visited they had both a sour and a berliner weisse on tap, as well as some great IPAs.  Not a particularly inspiring space, but it was unpretentious, uncrowded and friendly.
